Heyl/Heil Connection





prismkitty@msn.com

Heyl-Heil/ Barrett/ Foote Connection

First Generation

1. Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil) was born in Spandau, Brandenburge, Germany 1570.

He married Gertraut Buschler in St Nikolai, Church, Spandau, Brandenberg, 21 Sept 1597. Gertraut was born in Germany. Gertraut died after 1611 in Germany.

Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl (Heil) and Gertraut Buschler had the following child:

+ 2 i. Michael Ist,2 Heyl was born 1600.

Second Generation

2. Michael Ist,2 Heyl (Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Spandau, Germany 1600.

He married Catharine Winkler in Seehausen, Germany, 25 Jun 1623. Catharine was born in Seehausen, Germany. Catharine died before 1635. in Germany.

Michael Ist, Heyl and Catharine Winkler had the following child:

+ 3 i. Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl was born 26 Dec 1634.

Third Generation

3. Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl (Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Seehausen, Germany 26 Dec 1634. Jergen died in Germany.

He married Elsabe (Elshen) Grote in Wilsnack, Germany, 16 Aug 1657. Elsabe was born in Seehausen, Hesson Nassau, Germany 10 Aug 1637.

Jergen (George)2nd Heyl and Elsabe (Elshen) Grote had the following child:

+ 4 i. Adam4 Hoyle was born 8 Dec 1678.

Fourth Generation

4. Adam4 Hoyle (Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl, Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Weisbaden, Dist Of Nassau, Germany 8 Dec 1678. Adam died 8 APR. 1762 in Germany.

He married Nancy Leister in Germany, 4 Sep 1704. Nancy was born in Weisbaden Nassau, Germany 7 Aug 1681. Nancy died 4 Nov 1754 in Germany, at 73 years of age.

Adam Hoyle and Nancy Leister had the following child:

+ 5 i. Peter5 Hoyle was born 14 May 1710.

Fifth Generation

5. Peter5 Hoyle (Adam4, Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl, Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Weisbaden, Dist Of Nassau, Germany 14 May 1710. Peter died 1 Nov 1781 in South Fork Catawba River, Bladen Co, Nc, at 71 years of age.

He married Catharine Dales in Nassau Germany, 7 Apr 1736. Catharine was born in The Rhyne, Nassau, Germany 10 Apr 1714. Catharine died 7 Apr 1787 in Bladen Co. Nc, at 72 years of age.

Peter Hoyle and Catharine Dales had the following child:

+ 6 i. Katrina (Catharine)6 Hoyle was born unknown.

Sixth Generation

6. Katrina (Catharine)6 Hoyle (Peter5, Adam4, Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl, Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Pa Or Germany, unknown.

She married Bastian Best. Bastian was born in Germany.

Katrina (Catharine) Hoyle and Bastian Best had the following child:

+ 7 i. Catherine7 Best was born unknown.

Seventh Generation

7. Catherine7 Best (Katrina (Catharine)6 Hoyle, Peter5, Adam4, Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl, Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Nc.?

. She married Hans Jacob Hoffman. Hans was born in Germany 1716. Hans was the son of Hans Georg Hoffman and Priscilla Hoffman. Hans died in Nc.

. Catherine Best and Hans Jacob Hoffman had the following child:

+ 8 i. Jacob #28 Hoffman was born 1746.

Eighth Generation

8. Jacob #28 Hoffman (Catherine7 Best, Katrina (Catharine)6 Hoyle, Peter5, Adam4, Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl, Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Germany 1746. Jacob died 1816, in Hoyles Creek, Gaston Co. Nc.

He married Elizabeth (Shattle) Shetley in Pa. Elizabeth was born in Germany 1739. Elizabeth was the daughter of Jocob Shetley (Schattle) and Mrs Jacob Shetley. Elizabeth died 1816 in Day Aftr Husband, Nc, at 77 years of age.

Jacob #2 Hoffman and Elizabeth (Shattle) Shetley had the following child:

+ 9 i. Jacob Sidney9 Hoffman was born 30 Oct 1803.

Ninth Generation

9. Jacob Sidney9 Hoffman (Jacob #28, Catherine7 Best, Katrina (Catharine)6 Hoyle, Peter5, Adam4, Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl, Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Nc 30 Oct 1803. Jacob died 8 Feb 1893 in Gallatin, Mt, 90yrs Old, at 89 years of age.

He married Margaret Rhyne in Nc, 3 Feb 1829. Margaret was born in Nc, 25 Sept 1808. Margaret was the daughter of Daniel Rhyne and Catharine Hoffman. Margaret died 8 Oct 1899 in Lewiston, Fergus Co. Mt, 91 Yrs.

Jacob Sidney Hoffman and Margaret Rhyne had the following child:

+ 10 i. Barbara Ann10 Hoffman was born 1836.

Tenth Generation

10. Barbara Ann10 Hoffman (Jacob Sidney9, Jacob #28, Catherine7 Best, Katrina (Catharine)6 Hoyle, Peter5, Adam4, Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl, Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Lincoln Co.., Nc 1836. Barbara died 10 Feb 1910 in Belgrade, Gallatin, Mt, at 73 years of age. Her body was interred in Belgrade, Mt.

She married Alexander Barrett in Fredricktown, Madison, Mo, 1856. Alexander was born in Madison Co, Alabama 1829. Alexander was the son of George S. Barrett and Patsey Neville. Alexander died 1874-1875 in Fredericktown, Madison, Mo.

Barbara Ann Hoffman and Alexander Barrett had the following children:

11 i. James Sidney11 Barrett was born in Madison, Mo about 1853. James died before 1876 in unknown/did not marry.

12 ii. Mary Elizabeth Barrett was born in Mo about 1856. Mary died in unknown.

13 iii. Susan Barrett was born in Madison, Mo about 1857. Susan died 3 Dec 1892 in Wa, at 35 years of age. Her body was interred in Cleveland Cem, Klickitat Co, Wa.

14 iv. Nancy L. Barrett was born in Madison, Mo about 1860. Nancy died in possibly Mo.

15 v. David Barrett was born in Mo 26 Aug 1861. David died 7 Mar 1938 in Yakima Wa, at 76 years of age. His body was interred in Tahoma Cem., Yakima, Wa.

16 vi. Rosa Adeline Barrett was born in Fredericktown, Madison, Mo 15 Aug 1865. Rosa died 31 Mar 1944 in Yakima, Wa, at 78 years of age. Her body was interred in Tahoma Cem, Yakima, Wa.

+ 17 vii. Jacob Grant Barrett was born May 1867.

18 viii. Zetta Ann E. Barrett was born in Madison, Mo 1871. Zetta died in poss. Mo.

19 ix. Laura Francis Catherine Barrett was born in Madison, Mo 4 Nov 1874. Laura died 8 Mar 1951 in Gideon, Mo, at 76 years of age. Her body was interred in Stanfield Cemetery, Clarkton, Mo.

Eleventh Generation

17. Jacob Grant11 Barrett (Barbara Ann10 Hoffman, Jacob Sidney9, Jacob #28, Catherine7 Best, Katrina (Catharine)6 Hoyle, Peter5, Adam4, Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl, Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Big Creek, Madison Co., Mo May 1867. Jacob died 6 Apr 1911 in Dot, Klickitat Co., Wa, at 43 years of age. His body was interred Apr 1911 in Cleveland, Klickitat Co, Wa.

He married Cassie Ann Perlina Ferguson in Madison Co. Mo, 28 Nov 1888. Cassie was born in Twelve Mile, Madison Co. Mo 6 Sep 1870. Cassie was the daughter of John F Ferguson and Lucy Ann Perlina Skaggs. Cassie died 12 May 1912 in Los Angeles County, California, at 41 years of age. Her body was interred 1912 in Green Lawn Cem., La County, Ca.

Jacob Grant Barrett and Cassie Ann Perlina Ferguson had the following children:

20 i. Lucy Matilda Ann12 Barrett was born in Madison Co. Mo 20 Oct 1889. Lucy died 28 Nov 1901 in Dot, Klickitat Co. Wa, at 12 years of age. Her body was interred in Cleveland Cem, Klickitat, Wa.

+ 21 ii. Clara Belle Barrett was born 24 Jun 1891.

22 iii. Lillie Dorothy Barrett was born in Madison Co., Mo 3 Aug 1893. Lillie died 4 Apr 1911 in Dot, Wa, at 17 years of age. Her body was interred 1911, Cleveland Cem, Klickitat, Wa.

23 iv. Bessie Mae Barrett was born in Madison Co., Mo 12 Jan 1895. Bessie died 14 Apr 1911 in Dot, Klickitat Co., Wa, at 16 years of age. Her body was interred 1911,. in Cleveland Cem., Wa.

24 v. Charles Arthur Sidney Barrett was born in Dot Klickitat Co., Wa 15 Jan 1898. Charles died 25 Mar 1969 in Goldendale, Wa, at 71 years of age.

25 vi. Clarence Orville Barrett was born in Klickitat Co, Wa 1 Oct 1899. Clarence died 4 Aug 1968 at 68 years of age.

26 vii. Walter Albert Barrett was born in Roosevelt, Klickitat, Wa 3 Oct 1901. Walter died 12 Feb 1977 at 75 years of age.

27 viii. Lloyd Lemuel Barrett was born in Roosevelt, Wa 3 Aug 1904. Lloyd died 19 May 1981 in Hoquiam, Grays Harbor, Wa, at 76 years of age.

28 ix. Clyde Leon Barrett was born in Dot, Wa 24 Nov 1906. Clyde died 2 Apr 1965 in Yakima, Yakima Co., Wa, at 58 years of age. His body was interred 7 Apr 1965 in Tahoma Cemetery, Yakima, Wa.

29 x. Luella Mildred Barrett was born in Dot, Klickitat, Wa 21 Nov 1908. Luella died 17 Aug 1994 in Goldendale, Wa, at 85 years of age.

30 xi. Thelma Ruth Barrett was born in Roosevelt, Klickitat, Wa 22 Nov 1910. Thelma is living in The Dalles, Or at this writing.

Twelfth Generation

21. Clara Belle12 Barrett (Jacob Grant11, Barbara Ann10 Hoffman, Jacob Sidney9, Jacob #28, Catherine7 Best, Katrina (Catharine)6 Hoyle, Peter5, Adam4, Jergen (George)2nd3 Heyl, Michael Ist,2, Jurgen(Georg) I Heyl1 (Heil)) was born in Madison County, Mo 24 Jun 1891. Clara died Apr 1922 in Roosevelt, Klickitat County, Wa, at 30 years of age. Her body was interred in Cleveland Cemetery, Klickitat Co, Wa.

She married Jeremiah Henry Foote in Klickitat County, Wa, ca 1908. Jeremiah was born in Saltash Cornwall, Eng 22 Mar 1880. Jeremiah was the son of William Fredrick Foote and Lavinia Ann Blight. Jeremiah died 9 Apr 1963 (at the home of his first daughter by first wife.) Newton Abbott, Devon, Eng, at 83 years of age. His body was cremated 11 Apr 1963.

Clara Belle Barrett and Jeremiah Henry Foote had the following children:

31 i. Fredrick Grant13 Foote was born in Dot, Klickitat County, Wa 18 Sept 1909. Fredrick died 2 weeks old in Dot, Wa.

+ 32 ii. Delbert Henry Foote was born about 1911.

33 iii. Clara Foote was born in Dot, W 1913. Clara died infancy, Dot Wa. 34 iv. Arthur Ernest Foote was born in Dot Wa about 1914. Arthur died ca 1945, WWII in Japan, (a-bomb)captivity.

35 v. James L. Foote was born in Dot Wa 14 Feb 1916. James died during WWII in on board Ship, Pnuemonia. His body was interred at sea.

+ 36 vi. Geraldine Foote was born 14 Feb 1916.

+ 37 vii. *Lucille Clarabell Foote was born 13 Aug 1921.

* Lucille is my mother.
